name: Wheat Bread

metadata.description: Easy wheat bread. Makes a 12 slice round loaf.

steps: In a large bowl, combine [1cu:wheat flour], [2cu:all-purpose flour], [2tsp:salt], and [0.75tsp:active dry yeast].
Mix in [2cu:water] and stir well to combine into a ball of dough.
Cover and let sit to rise for 12 to 18 hrs.
Flour a surface and gently form dough into a ball shape.
Bake 30 mins covered, remove lid, then bake for another 10 mins.
